short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Amazon shopping experience with the Amazon Review Assistance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Amazon shopping experience with the Amazon Review Assistance Plugin! This handy browser extension allows you to quickly browse whole bunch of items on Amazon. This Plugin will filter out products based on your criteria of Ratings and Reviews. 

Features:
Customizable Filters: Set minimum review counts and ratings to highlight products that meet your standards.
Easy-to-Use Interface: Simple and intuitive interface makes setting your criteria a breeze.
Instant Feedback: Products that don't meet your criteria are greyed out, making it easy to focus on the best options.
Persistent Settings: Your preferences are saved and applied every time you shop on Amazon.

How to Use:
Install the Amazon Product Highlighter from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon to open the settings.
Set your desired minimum number of reviews and rating threshold.
Click the "Highlight Products" button to apply your settings.
Browse Amazon as usual, and see products that donâ€™t meet your criteria greyed out.

Privacy Policy:
Your privacy is important to us. The Amazon Product Highlighter does not collect, store, or share any personal information. All settings are stored locally in your browser.

Developed by:
Bhagyesh Patel
For more information, visit https://bhagyeshpatel.com.

Get started today and make your Amazon shopping faster and easier with the Amazon Review Assistance
